wikitext.*:
'''Andrew H. Morton''' is an author, composer, and works as an English teacher. He has written two books about young [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s relationship to [[Jane Neave]] and to locations in [[Birmingham]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/830-Interview_with_Andrew_H_Morton_on_Tolkien_Gedling.php|articlename=Interview with Andrew H. Morton on Tolkien's Gedling|dated=|website=TL|accessed=23 January 2012}}</ref>

==Bibliography, selected==
===Books===
*[[2008]]: ''[[Tolkien's Gedling|Tolkien's Gedling - 1914: The Birth Of A Legend]]'' (with John Hayes)
*[[2009]]: ''[[Tolkien's Bag End|Tolkien's Bag End: Treshold to Adventure]]''
===Articles===
*[[2008]]: [[Amon Hen 210|''Amon Hen'' 210]]
**"In Search of Earendel, Jane Neave and Phoenix Farm"
